note:
Anarchist, currently wandering around Scotland with my dogs Luther and Jethro, a tent and a backpack that is way too heavy.

Unthanc: derives from a pre 7th century Olde English word "unpance" which means literally "without leave," and described an area of land which was occupied unlawfully.

Banner Picture: A black Labrador and a Yellow Labrador in profile at the edge of a field both looking intently at something out of the cameras view.

fields.name: Location
fields.value: Lost Somewhere in Time and Scotland
